thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Eddie West
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Eddie West

author: Eddie West
title: Eddie West
text:
Banggood is has some great products and some very competitive prices, especially as there are no delivery charges. even when on the odd occasion there is a problem they go to great lengths to put matters right.
I had an order that did nor arrive. No quibble they just sent a replacement.
Excellent customer service and good communications.
EW
UK
